Name: Mexican Martini (Añejo Margarita)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of jalapeño stuffed Fragata Green Olives .
Review: Basically, a top-shelf Margarita garnished with jalapeño stuffed olives.
Nutrition: One serving of Mexican Martini (Añejo Margarita) contains 146 calories
